Module: cli/lsp

lsp api exposed via the command line. When called from the command line, parses the command line arguments, calls the required functions from main and prints out the output to the console.
Source:
  • bin/lsp.js, line 3

Methods

(inner) cli()

Helper method that calls either lsp or listDeepestPaths based on the arguments passed via the command line.
Source:
  • bin/lsp.js, line 74

(inner) listDeepestPaths(baseDir)

Prints out the number of files and subdirectories that are at the deepest level from the base direcotry and their level relative to the base directory, along with each path, to the console.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
baseDir string path of the directory for which the deepest paths are to be listed
Source:
  • bin/lsp.js, line 57

(inner) lsp(baseDir, depth, showHidden, fullRecurse)

Prints out the contents of a directory, and it's sub directories to a given depth or till the maximum depth if fullRecurse is true, to the console
Parameters:
Name Type Description
baseDir string path to the directory the contents of which are to be listed
depth number the maximum depth, relative to the base directory till will results are be to fetched recursively. Defaults to 0
showHidden boolean whether to list hidden files and directories. Defaults to false
fullRecurse boolean whether to fetch contents of all sub directories of the base directory. Defaults to false
Source:
  • bin/lsp.js, line 42
